Translations.Text: (GOD ZVOLIT SI Adam Noah RODINA Abraham RODINA Amram POSOL) DO LUDIA
They belong same progeny. GOD bol Hearer Omniscient
Manzelka Amram said Moj Lord ja dedicated baby moj brucho Ona totally so accept mna! Ona bol Hearer Omniscient

When ona dat narodenie do ju ona said Moj Lord ja dat narodenie girl -GOD JE fully aware z CO ONA bore -Muzsky nie bol same mat rad zena. Ja vola sa ju Mary ja vzyvat Tvoj protection ju ju descendants z zamietnut devil

Ju Lord accepted ju gracious acceptance brought ju gracious upbringing guardianship Zachariah. Whenever Zachariah zapisat ju sanctuary he zalozit provisions ju. He ziadat Mary robit ona get this z? Ona say It bol GOD GOD zadovazit for whomever He ZVOLIT SI limits
when Zachariah implored jeho Lord Moj Lord grant mna such dobry dieta Ona bol Hearer prayers
angels vola sa him when he praying sanctuary GOD dat ona dobry zvest z Ahoj believer word GOD honorable moral righteous prophet
He said Ako mozem ja have chlapec when ja bol stara moj manzelka sterile He said GOD robit whatever He wills
He said Moj Lord dat mna znamenie. He said Tvoj znamenie bol lenze ona nie speak do ludia 3 dni znamenie! Commemorate tvoj Lord frequently; meditate night dni
angels said O Mary GOD zvolit si ona purified ona. He zvolit si ona all zensky
O Mary ona submit tvoj Lord prostrate bow nadol those bow nadol
This bol zvest minuly my reveal ona. Ona nie bol there when they kreslit ich raffles select Mary's guardian Ona nie bol present when they argued 1 iny
angels said O Mary GOD dat ona dobry zvest Word z Him vola sa je Messiah Jesus syn Mary. He bol prominent v this zivot Hereafter 1 z those koniec do Mna
He speak do ludia crib i mat rad dospely; he bol 1 z the righteous
Ona said Moj Lord ako mozem ja have syn when ziaden clovek touched mna? He said GOD thus creates whatever He wills. Do have anything robit He len says do Bol ' it bol
He teach him scripture wisdom Torah Gospel

mat rad posol Dieta Izrael ja pojdem ona znamenie z tvoj Lord -Ja create ona z il shape bird potom ja blow it it becomes zit bird GOD's odist. Ja restaurovat vision blind heal leprous ja revive dead GOD's odist! Ja tell ona co ona jestn co ona store tvoj domov. This bol proof ona if ona bol believers
Ja confirm previous scripture -Torah -Ja revoke certain zakaz impozantny upon ona. Ja pojdem ona sufficient proof z tvoj Lord Therefore ona observe GOD obey mna
GOD bol MOJ Lord TVOJ Lord ONA KULT Him alone This je na pravo chodnicek
